page.title: 14Farming in Parbold-Hilldale
page.content: Farming Machinery Tractors are owned by most farmers in the area.Harrock Hall Farm has 2 Massey Fergusson tractors,both with 2-wheel drive.They hired a $50000 New Holland forage harvester to cut the grass and blow it into a trailer for silage.A big 4-wheel drive front loader from Baxters was pressing down the silage to get air and water out.There was a Fiat with a slurry tank.Beyond Bispham Green on the main road is Cornthwaites Machinery Distributors.They sell M.F.Tractors, John Deere Tractors,muck-spreaders, ploughs,mowers,hedge-cutters,combine- harvesters and McConnell balers.They sell locally ,nationally but not to other countries.
